description: Returns a list of dataset groups. The response provides the properties for each dataset group, including the Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information on dataset groups, see CreateDatasetGroup.

nested_items.name: datasetGroups
nested_items.description: The list of your dataset groups.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset group.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset group was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset group was last updated.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If creating a dataset group fails, the reason behind the failure.

nested_items.name: domain
nested_items.description: The domain of a Domain dataset group.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token for getting the next set of dataset groups (if they exist).
